reviewText: I've had a VCR version for many years. When my VCR refused to work, I ordered the DVD version. I love it.

At first, I didn't care for this particular workout.  Then I realized it was because it challenged me and made me try.  It will seem odd at first that these seemingly conservative movements will strengthen you, but they do!
If you really want to get the benefits of yoga, try with any of the Wai Lana videos, she is the best!
I love this yoga very simple and easy and great for your health, it really helps me out on my long distance bicycle trips
